The Edutainment Experiance

MIDDLE EAST EXPO ORG

Understand

OUR VISION

*

Middle East Expo Org is a Dubai based private company who aims to enrich the UAE entertainment program for children by bringing top international exhibitions to the UAE.

Structured as a startup, the core activity of Middle East Expo isedutainment only.

OUR VISION

is to bring exhibitions with educational background to the youth community in the UAE.


OUR STRATEGY

is to become the Middle Eastern partner of top international exhibitions and to be seen as the “must go’ school trip by professional of the education industry and parents.

Our

FOUNDERS

Discover

OUR BACKGROUND

*

Dubai has always been teeming with glamorous things to explore, right from the tallest tower in the world to one of the world’s largest shopping malls. But when it came to matters of the mind, Jean-Charles and Sabrina Durand noticed a distinct lack of locally-based school trips for their kids that were both entertaining and engaging.

As the founding couple behind one of the most established events and exhibition companies in the region, the duo have launched Middle East Expo Org., using edutainment as a key tool With a mission to spark an evolution in the local mindsets, important messages are delivered through an engaging medium.

Not only does this encourage younger residents to think outside the box, it also alters the mentality of Dubai’s older citizens. With enthusiasm, innovation, and cutting-edge ideas; Jean-Charles and Sabrina Durand intend to make their company a regional leader in the edutainment industry.
